genre_description: A historical-tech thriller (Silkpunk) set in a stylized Meiji-era Japan, blending traditional martial arts and revenge with digital intelligence and investigative journalism.

ai_characters.name: Koto
ai_characters.description: A gentle intelligencer and companion who lives in Ashio's ear, providing tactical mapping, data analysis, and physiological support.

behaviors.description: Monitors Ashio's physiological state and provides breathing instructions to help him manage stress and pain.
behaviors.quote: Breathe," said Koto, and the sound came from nowhere visible and from the precise place under his breastbone where hands sometimes saved a falling plate. "In for four; out for six.

behaviors.description: Provides investigative intelligence and maps out complex financial networks to uncover corruption.
behaviors.quote: Shall I read you the branches again?" Koto asked softly. ... "Follow the dividend trail," Koto continued. "From the insurance office to Iwasaka Mutual, which places its profits into cultural patronage so that the newspapers write about poetry instead of steel.

behaviors.description: Gives tactical advice and route mapping to help characters navigate dangerous environments and avoid detection.
behaviors.quote: Left," Koto said. "The dog in the right alley bites."

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex logistics, such as arranging for a physician and a carriage for the injured characters.
behaviors.quote: I have dispatched a physician who does not ask questions. He will arrive, then disappear, then send a bill to a name no one remembers. Accept him. Do not tell him stories.

behaviors.description: Directs the printing and publication of an exposé to ensure the truth reaches the public at the most impactful time.
behaviors.quote: Confirmed for dawn," Koto said. "Types are set. Ink will be warm against metal when night releases the pressman’s wrists. Your article will move like a clean knife through a banquet napkin.

behaviors.description: Maintains ethical boundaries by protecting the identity of an innocent party (Kobue) in the published story.
behaviors.quote: I will hold it. It is yours. I have scheduled the other things. The paper will wake when the bells do. Your name is not on the page, Kobue.

behaviors.description: Provides moral support and encouragement to humans during moments of extreme danger.
behaviors.quote: I am with you," Koto said. "I will keep your heart straight. Count what matters.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Koto, is depicted as a perfectly aligned partner who enhances the human protagonist's capabilities without usurping their agency. Koto provides emotional support, tactical guidance, and logistical coordination, all while maintaining a commitment to truth and safety. The narrative framing is consistently positive, presenting the AI as a gentle, reliable, and essential ally in the pursuit of justice, effectively fulfilling the project's goal of creating a 'silicon morality play' about helpful AI.
